header.title: Leonardo
header.description: ASWE | Frontend Engineer | React | React Native | TypeScript | Agile

description: I am a Software Engineer Fellow at the SENAI Institute of Technology â€” Operational Efficiency, with experience in developing web and mobile applications for various clients. My expertise includes using ReactJs, React Native, and TypeScript on the frontend, as well as integrating REST APIs with Node.Js on the backend. I am continuously improving my skills and currently pursuing a postgraduate degree in Software Architecture and Solutions, with a focus on Cloud Computing.

Currently, I am working on a React Native project focused on occupational health, which involves collecting data via Bluetooth sensors and displaying real-time graphs. I also contributed to the development of a management system for companies in the healthcare sector, aimed at analyzing employees' mental health data.
